title: US stock futures rebound today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq on the move as crypto-linked stocks signal a recovery; ADP jobs data looms
description: US stock futures rebound today as Dow rises 80 points to 47,624, S&P 500 adds 9.25 to 6,849.50, and Nasdaq gains 25.50 to 25,631.50 in early trade. Crypto-linked stocks lead momentum with PMAX up 67%, CMCT up 30%, and ABTC up 12%. Nvidia and Marvell also edge…
content: U.S. stock futures showed a mild positive tone today. Dow Futures rose to 47,624, up 80 points or 0.17%, supported by strength across large-cap tech and select high-volume pre-market gainers. The pre… [+5526 chars]
